resources.string:
Poison Plants was created by:
 
 	-Nevya Patel
 	-Shelly Fonceca
 	-Cassandra Hermosillo
 	-Jocelyn Salas
 
 	Created at Nicolas Jr. High for the purpose of competing in the United States Congressional App Competition.

Welcome to the Poison Plants App!
 
 	Click the Search tab to find plants by County, you will be given a list of images to compare a potentially poisonous plant to. By clicking on this image, you will be taken to a webpage with more information!
 
 	Click the Call tab to be given a list of phone numbers that may be useful in case of accidental contact or ingestion of a potentially poisonous plant.
 
 	Lastly, if you would like more information about the creators of this app, please click on the About tab.

Numbers In Case of Questions/Emergencies:
 
 - Emergency Telephone Number:

 		911

 - Centers for Disease Control (CDC):

 		1-800-232-4636

 - United States Poison Control:

 		1-800-222-1222
